title: DomainNames4Sale
author: DomainNames4Sale
content: I’m selling a Charizard Shadowless PSA 9 Base Set 1999Includes a orange protective cover.Price: $5250 equivalent in BTC or ETH at the time of sale+ ShippingPictures:https://ibb.co/1TyQm7Xhttps://ibb.co/K6B1dMw

comments.author: DomainNames4Sale
comments.body: Offers are welcome, escrow can be discussed

comments.author: El duderino_
comments.body: Nice Charizard card GL with selling...

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: That is a nice looking Pokeman card.....IIRC the most expensive pokeman card out there is one just like this but graded gem?

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Hello @DomainNames4Sale, I have some cards (received years ago as gift) so actually I am not the best collector of Pokemon Card...so please forgive my question if too basic...If I am not wrong this card with PSA 9 should be this one here?https://www.pricecharting.com/game/pokemon-base-set/charizard-4#completed-auctions-gradedDid you plan to lower your request? What about shipment fee and from where you're shipping?

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on September 13, 2023, 06:00:03 AMHello @DomainNames4Sale, I have some cards (received years ago as gift) so actually I am not the best collector of Pokemon Card...so please forgive my question if too basic...If I am not wrong this card with PSA 9 should be this one here?https://www.pricecharting.com/game/pokemon-base-set/charizard-4#completed-auctions-gradedDid you plan to lower your request? What about shipment fee and from where you're shipping?There is a small difference which makes it higher in the reselling price. OP is offering a "shadowless" charizard - these are even rarer then the ones that were listed on ur pricecharting-list.Looked thru that list and the highest one which was sold for 1.5k $ wasn't one that is listed in this thread.  This list should fit better:https://www.pricecharting.com/game/pokemon-base-set/charizard-shadowless-4?q=charizard+shadowless

comments.author: DomainNames4Sale
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on September 13, 2023, 06:00:03 AMHello @DomainNames4Sale, I have some cards (received years ago as gift) so actually I am not the best collector of Pokemon Card...so please forgive my question if too basic...If I am not wrong this card with PSA 9 should be this one here?https://www.pricecharting.com/game/pokemon-base-set/charizard-4#completed-auctions-gradedDid you plan to lower your request? What about shipment fee and from where you're shipping?Hi,No, it’s not that card. For charizards from 1999 we have these main 3 versions: 1st edition, shadowless and unlimited. That link you showed is the unlimited version (cheapest one).The one I’m selling is the shadowless version in mint condition PSA 9, here it is:https://www.pricecharting.com/game/pokemon-base-set/charizard-shadowless-4Also if you want to understand the differences between the versions:https://sellpoke.com/value-of-old-charizard-pokemon-card/Do a CTRL+F there and search for “difference between 1st edition, shadowless, and shadow”, they explain the differences.Also for the shipping, it is about $100 (insured and assuming you’re in US) and the card is shipped from Switzerland

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: OP: send me a PM sometime and I'll tell you about my experiences trying to sell Pokemon cards here a while ago.
